channel.title: CVE Feed for WebToffee -- WordPress Comments Import & Export
channel.description: The latest CVEs for WebToffee -- WordPress Comments Import & Export

item.title: CVE-2022-45370|2024-08-03T14:09:57.019Z -- webtoffee -- wordpress%20comments%20import%20%26%20export
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Formula Elements in a CSV File vulnerability in WebToffee WordPress Comments Import & Export.This issue affects WordPress Comments Import & Export: from n/a through 2.3.1.

item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in WebToffee WordPress Comments Import & Export.This issue affects WordPress Comments Import & Export: from n/a through 2.3.5.
